title: A vindication of the Animadversions on Fiat lux wherein the principles of the Roman church, as to moderation, unity and truth are examined and sundry important controversies concerning the rule of faith, papal supremacy, the mass, images, &c. discussed / by John Owen.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
publisher: Printed for Ph. Stephens ..., and George Sawbridge ...,
